Package assemAssist

Class AssemblyTask

java.lang.Object
assemAssist.AssemblyTask
public class AssemblyTask extends Object
Class representing an assembly task.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AssemblyTask(String name, String taskDefinition)
    Creates an assembly task at the given work station for a given component, with the given task definition.
